dmca.title: WWE DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

 

World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc. ("WWE") is the exclusive owner of
numerous trademarks, service marks, trade dress and copyrights,
including, but not limited to, WWE, the WWE logo, RAW, SmackDown, ECW,
WCW, as well as all of its talent images, likenesses, and rights of
publicity.  WWE, as the premier provider of wrestling entertainment
services, has through extensive use and promotion of its intellectual
property, established substantial and valuable good will in its
intellectual property.  As such, WWE vigilantly protects its
intellectual property rights and does not tolerate any infringement of
the same.

 

WWE has discovered that its copyrighted images, programming and/or
hyperlinks to this content have been uploaded as Android apps to the
Android Market, without the authorization of WWE.  This infringing
content is located at the following URLs:

 

https://market.android.com/details?id=mobi.bbase.ahome.theme.wweraw&feat
ure=search_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.wwewallpaper&feature=search_re
sult

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.strongwwe&feature=search_resul
t

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.andromobi.adwwwejohncenatheme&
feature=search_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.dontstopthepress.therocksays&f
eature=search_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.dontstopthepress.stonecoldsaid
so&feature=search_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.giangapps.ebcfxbkmqedzvqc&feat
ure=search_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.shotware.randyortonnewsclocks&
feature=search_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.shotware.johncenanewsclocks&fe
ature=search_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app209641&feature=sear
ch_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app210101&feature=sear
ch_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app213503&feature=more
_from_developer

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.giangapps.slzyzjghzgixbgi&feat
ure=search_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app210200&feature=sear
ch_result

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app213251

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app213068

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app213151

 

 

WWE has its own apps, whether privately owned or licensed, available on
the Android Market. Therefore, as a result and because of the
aforementioned reasons, WWE demands the immediate removal of these
Android apps and references thereto within the Android Market.  I have
good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described
above and contained on the service is not authorized by the copyright
owner, WWE, its agent, or by protection of law.

 

I swear under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.  The demands made herein are not made to the
exclusion of other remedies to which WWE is entitled and WWE
specifically reserves the right to seek all remedies available to it
under law as a result of these infringing activities.

 

Regards,

 

Matthew C. Winterroth

Associate Counsel, Intellectual Property

Legal and Business Affairs

WWE

[redacted]

Stamford, CT 06902

Tel:  +1 [redacted]

Fax: +1 [redacted]
